text: The Madagascar franchise from DreamWorks Animation, consists of four movies: Madagascar (2005), Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa (2008), Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted (2012) and Penguins of Madagascar (2014). Two Annie Award-winning shorts, Merry Madagascar (2009) and Madly Madagascar (2013), were also released. A TV show for Nickelodeon called The Penguins of Madagascar ==Movies== * Madagascar (2005) * Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa (2008) * Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted (2012) ===Spin-off=== * Penguins of Madagascar (2014) ==Television specials== * Merry Madagascar (2009) * Madly Madagascar (2013) ==TV Series== * The Penguins of Madagascar (2008-2015) * All Hail King Julien (2014-2017) * Madagascar: A Little Wild (2020-2022) Category:Animation Category:Media franchises Category:Madagascar (franchise)
title: Madagascar (franchise)
